name: Smooch That Fish
description:
My name is Ryan and I am 10 years old. The game I made is Smooch the Fish. I hope you like it!

2D platformer, play as a penguin collecting popsicles and avoiding enemies as you platform across diverse levels to reach your fishy friend.

Instructions:

- ASDF = Move
- Left Ctrl / Mouse Click = Throw snowball
- Space = Jump
